about.title: Who am i?
about.desc: Hi! I'm Kevin, i have 20yo and i'am a web developer who is pasionate about programming since i was a kid and currently i'm studying as a self-learner, and day by day without breaks, with the intention and motivation to be able to be the best in what i do and offer help to others. I have the persistance and capability to confront and keep going through any adventure/problem that goes into my trayectory.
about.desc1: I will give my best to try to solve any problem or drawback your are going through. Using all my resources and knowledge, so i can give you that solution you were seeking
